fixed: Fixed an issue that allowed users to buy items from server shop even if they didn't had enough balance, which decreased their balance below 0.
improved: The items you buy from server shop won't go in vain now. All of them are preserved in your items list.
Added `loop` as an alias of `repeat` command.
Added `purge` as an alias of `clear` command.
added: You can now see the items you've brought from the server shop using the `myItems` command.
